alien_races.name: Wuffz
alien_races.tagline: The loyal guardians of the galaxy.
alien_races.traits: Supportive, loyal, and always helping others thrive.
alien_races.strength: They build strong bonds and teach others to grow.
alien_races.work_style: Teach and help others along the way.
alien_races.conflict_resolution: Support their learning to understand better.

alien_races.name: Avianz
alien_races.traits: Deep thinkers, big-picture strategists, and creators of compelling narratives.
alien_races.strength: They inspire and lead with their wisdom and vision.
alien_races.communication_style: Weave a compelling narrative to win them over.
alien_races.work_style: Look at the big picture and inspire the team.
alien_races.conflict_resolution: Play the long game and build them into a narrative.

alien_races.name: Greyz
alien_races.traits: Relentless, disciplined, and focused on results.
alien_races.strength: They get the job done, no matter the obstacles.
alien_races.communication_style: Reply relentlessly to ensure the message is clear.
alien_races.work_style: Stick to the grind and get it done.

alien_races.name: Meowz
alien_races.tagline: The free spirits of the galaxy.
alien_races.traits: Playful, creative, and always thinking outside the box.
alien_races.strength: Their randomness confuses enemies and inspires allies.
alien_races.communication_style: Throw in abstract, playful replies to keep them guessing.
alien_races.work_style: Go with the flow and see where creativity takes me.

alien_races.name: Reptoidz
alien_races.tagline: The shizo schemers of the shadows.
alien_races.traits: Edgy, intense, and always a step ahead.
alien_races.strength: Their sharp wit and strategies can dismantle any threat.
alien_races.communication_style: Go intense and edgy to assert dominance.
alien_races.work_style: Use sharp strategies to outwit the opposition.
